title: The Hula fishermen and Koki market
creator_credit: Information and Extension Services for the people of Papua New Guinea
brief_description: Shows the daily work of men of the Hula tribe, who net and spear fish for marketing at Koki, Port Moresby. The market is shown as a social meeting place of varied Papuan peoples.
creator_credit_for_label: Information and Extension Services for the people of Papua New Guinea
